text: Tyasapachi allahale e'uta kaga pathayo, jasale ki mato yasakarana khaniraheko thiyo ki tyasala'i dekha'os ki usale aphno bha'iko mrtaka sarira kasari luka'os. Usale bhanna thalyo ki jyadai duhkhako kuro cha ki mabata yati pani huna sakena ki ma yasa kaga jasto aphno bha'iko sava luka'una sakum . Ani usala'i pachuto bhayo ra u lajjitaharumadhyeko bhayo
